<title level="1" right="Hazard 4" pfs="">[Oil Explosion](/Hazards.aspx?ID=118)</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Environmental" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=62" />
<trait label="Fire" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=72" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Pathfinder #176: Lost Mammoth Valley](/Sources.aspx?ID=113) pg. 7</row>

**Complexity** Simple

</column>

The flammable oil catches flame and explodes, burning up in a ball of fire.

---

**Stealth**
DC 22 (trained)

**Disable**
DC 25 [Survival](/Skills.aspx?ID=16) (trained) or DC 23 [Crafting](/Skills.aspx?ID=4) to neutralize the oil without setting it alight

<column gap="tiny">

**AC** 21, **Fort** +14, **Ref** +14

**Immunities**
critical hits, object immunities, precision damage

</column>

**Explode** <actions string="Reaction" /> **Trigger** An open flame is brought into area A4; **Effect** The oil on the walls explodes, dealing 4d8+10 fire damage to all creatures and objects in areas A4 and A3 (DC 21 [basic](/Rules.aspx?ID=329) Reflex save).
